author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

The interface of some of the CondDB services have been improved:

IOVProxy: IOV iterators moved in a specific class ( IOVArray )
IOVEditor: added eraseIov method 
Session :   adapted for new IOVProxy + added getCurrentRun method
Tag_t, TagInfo_t : improved field names

All the dependencies have been fixed in various packages

#### PR validation:

unit tests in CondCore/CondDB run
title: Improvements in the CondDB interface
